      static java.lang.String join​(java.lang.String delimiter, java.lang.String[] stringArray)
      Returns a new String composed of copies of the array elements joined together with a copy of the specified delimiter.
      static java.lang.String join​(java.lang.String delimiter, java.util.List<java.lang.String> stringList)
      Returns a new String composed of copies of the list elements joined together with a copy of the specified delimiter.

      • join

        public static java.lang.String join​(java.lang.String delimiter,

        Parameters:

        stringArray - The strings to join
